context.text: List of cities in Bulgaria - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
# City Province ( Oblast ) Population 1991 census Population 2001 census March 2008 calculation [1]
This is a list of cities in Bulgaria with over 20,000 inhabitants. Province capitals are shown in bold .
^ Head Direction of Residential Registration and Administrative Service. Population table by permanent and present address as of 15 March 2007 . Visited 21 May 2006.
